actor_awards.notes: Won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for 'Cool Hand Luke' (1967). He is the only actor to appear in all four films of the 'Airport' franchise. He successfully transitioned from tough-guy roles to comedy with 'The Naked Gun' series.

filmography.title: Cool Hand Luke
filmography.role_description: The leader of the prison camp inmates who initially fights Luke but eventually becomes his closest friend and disciple.
filmography.plot: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

filmography.title: Charade
filmography.role_description: A metal-handed criminal who threatens a widow in Paris in search of a stolen fortune.
filmography.plot: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen.

filmography.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
filmography.role_description: The oblivious and straight-faced police captain who supervises the bumbling Frank Drebin.
filmography.plot: Incompetent police Lieutenant Frank Drebin must try to foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

filmography.title: Airport
filmography.role_description: The tough, cigar-chomping chief mechanic who must clear a stuck plane from a runway during a blizzard.
filmography.plot: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: The Dirty Dozen
filmography.role_description: The aide to the General who helps recruit and train the convicts for their suicide mission.
filmography.plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

filmography.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
filmography.role_description: A vicious bank robber and former partner of Thunderbolt who seeks revenge and the loot from a past heist.
filmography.plot: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

filmography.title: Lonely Are the Brave
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic modern-day sheriff who reluctantly pursues a cowboy fugitive.
filmography.plot: A defiant cowboy gets himself locked up in prison to help a friend escape, only to find that the friend doesn't want to go.

filmography.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
filmography.role_description: A robust oil worker and passenger who helps in the desperate attempt to rebuild a plane in the desert.
filmography.plot: After a plane crash in the Sahara, one of the survivors announces that he's an airplane designer and they can make a flyable plane from the wreckage.

filmography.title: Shenandoah
filmography.role_description: A Union Colonel who interacts with the Anderson family during the Civil War.
filmography.plot: A Virginia farmer declines to join the Confederate army because he does not own slaves and does not want to fight for the North because he is a Virginian.

filmography.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
filmography.role_description: A hired gun and antagonist who faces off against the Elder brothers.
filmography.plot: Four brothers reunite in their Texas hometown to attend their mother's funeral and investigate the mysterious circumstances of her death.

filmography.title: In Harm's Way
filmography.role_description: A specialized officer who helps plan a crucial mission in the Pacific theater.
filmography.plot: A naval officer reprimanded after Pearl Harbor is later promoted to rear admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.

filmography.title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
filmography.role_description: A foreman who investigates the secrets of the decaying plantation.
filmography.plot: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness when her cousin arrives to evict her.

filmography.title: The Boston Strangler
filmography.role_description: A dedicated detective investigating the series of stranglings in Boston.
filmography.plot: Investigators search for the strangler terrorizing Boston, leading to the arrest of Albert DeSalvo.

filmography.title: Mirage
filmography.role_description: A mysterious man who aids an amnesiac in uncovering his past.
filmography.plot: A man suffering from amnesia is treated by a psychiatrist and begins to uncover a murder plot.

filmography.title: Strait-Jacket
filmography.role_description: The farmhand who welcomes a woman back home after she is released from an asylum.
filmography.plot: A mother returns to her daughter after twenty years in an asylum for a double murder, but new killings start occurring.

filmography.title: Earthquake
filmography.role_description: A tough Los Angeles police sergeant dealing with personal and professional chaos during a massive earthquake.
filmography.plot: Various Los Angeles residents struggle to survive a catastrophic earthquake that destroys the city.

filmography.title: Death on the Nile
filmography.role_description: The lawyer and trustee of the wealthy murder victim.
filmography.plot: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board.

filmography.title: The Eiger Sanction
filmography.role_description: An old friend and climbing partner who runs a resort near the Eiger mountain.
filmography.plot: An art history professor and collector, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

filmography.title: Cahill U.S. Marshal
filmography.role_description: A corrupt lawman involved in a bank robbery scheme.
filmography.plot: A tough U.S. Marshal ignores his two sons to hunt down bad guys, only to find his boys are involved with the outlaws he is chasing.

filmography.title: Bandolero!
filmography.role_description: A determined sheriff pursuing a gang of outlaws into Mexico to rescue a hostage.
filmography.plot: A sheriff chases two brothers and their gang into Mexican territory after they rob a bank and kidnap a woman.

filmography.title: Guns of the Magnificent Seven
filmography.role_description: The leader of the seven gunfighters, taking over the role originated by Yul Brynner.
filmography.plot: A new group of seven gunmen is hired to rescue a Mexican revolutionary leader from a brutal military prison.

filmography.title: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
filmography.role_description: The police captain who continues to suffer through the incompetence of Frank Drebin.
filmography.plot: Lieutenant Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates for solar energy.

filmography.title: Naked Gun 33⅓: The Final Insult
filmography.role_description: The retired police captain who pulls Frank Drebin back into duty.
filmography.plot: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

filmography.title: Airport 1975
filmography.role_description: Now an executive, Patroni must help guide a damaged 747 to safety.
filmography.plot: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and the airport's Vice President of Operations must help talk the stewardess down.

filmography.title: The Delta Force
filmography.role_description: A priest on a hijacked airplane who comforts the passengers.
filmography.plot: A 707 aircraft jetliner is hijacked by terrorists, and The Delta Force is sent in to resolve the crisis.

filmography.title: Creepshow 2
filmography.role_description: An elderly store owner who is murdered, sparking the supernatural revenge of 'Old Chief Wood'nhead'.
filmography.plot: Three more bone-chilling tales based on the stories of Stephen King.

filmography.title: Fools' Parade
filmography.role_description: A sadistic prison guard who pursues released convicts for their money.
filmography.plot: Three ex-convicts try to set up a legitimate business but are pursued by a corrupt banker and a sadistic prison guard.
